metadata.title: CVE-2011-4915 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: fs/proc/base.c in the Linux kernel through 3.1 allows local users to obtainsensitive keystroke information via access to /proc/interrupts.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'upstream determined we have sufficient facilities already').
